title: jmri-json-configProfile-server-message
description: Data portion of message from JMRI to client for type "configProfile"

uniqueId.description: Uniqueness portion of configuration profile Id

isActiveProfile.description: True if this configuration profile is active; false otherwise

isAutoStart.description: True if this configuration profile will start with no delay next time JMRI is started; false otherwise

isNextProfile.description: True if this configuration profile will be the one started the next time JMRI is started; false otherwise
